National Sentence Text: Words and phrases used in Division B that are not included in the list of definitions in Article 1.4.1.2. shall have the meanings that are commonly assigned to them in the context in which they are used, taking into account the specialized use of terms by the various trades and professions to which the terminology applies.
P/T Sentence Text: Words and phrases used in Division B that are not included in the list of definitions in Article 1.4.1.2. shall have the meanings defined in the Safety Codes Act and its Regulations or the NFC(AE), or the meanings that are commonly assigned to them in the context in which they are used, taking into account the specialized use of terms by the various trades and professions to which the terminology applies.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Words and phrases used in Division B that are not included in the list of definitions in Article 1.4.1.2. of Division A shall have the meanings defined in the Safety Codes Act and its Regulations or the NFC(AE), or the meanings that are commonly assigned to them in the context in which they are used, taking into account the specialized use of terms by the various trades and professions to which the terminology applies.

National Sentence Text: Doorways in a path of travel to at least one bathroom within a suite of residential occupancy shall have a clear width not less than 800 mm when the doors are open. (See Note A-3.8.3.6.(3).) (See Note A-3.8.3.6.(3).)
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Doorways in a path of travel to at least one bathroom within a suite of residential occupancy shall have a clear width not less than 800 mm when the doors are open. (See Note A-3.8.3.6.(3).)
P/T Sentence Text: Doorways in a path of travel to at least one bathroom within a suite of residential occupancy shall have a clear width not less than 850 mm when the doors are in the open position. (See Note A-3.8.3.6.(3).)
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Doorways in a path of travel to at least one bathroom within a suite of residential occupancy shall have a clear width not less than 850 mm when the doors are in the open position. (See Note A-3.8.3.6

P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Subsection 6., systems serving spaces that contain hazardous gases, dusts or liquids shall be designed, constructed and installed to conform to the requirements of this Code or, in the absence of specific requirements, to good engineering practice such as that described in the publications of the National Fire Protection Association and in the NFC(AE). (See Note A-6.9.1.2.(1).)
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Except as provided in Subsection 6.3.4., systems serving spaces that contain hazardous gases, dusts or liquids shall be designed, constructed and installed to conform to the requirements of this Code or, in the absence of specific requirements, to good engineering practice such as that described in the publications of the National Fire Protection Association and in the NFC(AE). (See Note A-6.9.1.2.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Subsection 6.3.4., systems serving spaces that contain hazardous gases, dusts or liquids shall be designed, constructed and installed to conform to the requirements of the applicable provincial or territorial regulations or municipal bylaws or, in the absence of such regulations or bylaws, to good engineering practice such as that described in the publications of the National Fire Protection Association and in the NFC. (See Note A-6.9.1.2.(1).)
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Except as provided in Subsection 6.3.4., systems serving spaces that contain hazardous gases, dusts or liquids shall be designed, constructed and installed to conform to the requirements of the applicable provincial or territorial regulations or municipal bylaws or, in the absence of such regulations or bylaws, to good engineering practice such as that described in the publications of the National Fire Protection Association and in the NFC. (See Note A-6.9.1.2.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Ducts used to ventilate a flammable liquids or combustible liquids storage room described in Sentence 6.9.1.2.(3) shall be used solely for that purpose.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Ducts used to ventilate a flammable liquids or combustible liquids storage room described in Sentence 6.9.1.2.(3) shall be used solely for that purpose.

National Sentence Text: All walls, ceilings and floors separating heated space from unheated space, the exterior air or the exterior soil shall be provided with sufficient thermal insulation to prevent moisture condensation on their room side during the winter and to ensure comfortable conditions for the occupants. (See Note A-9.1.1.1.(1).) (See Note A-9.1.1.1.(1).)
Matched National Sentence (Variation): All walls, ceilings and floors separating heated space from unheated space, the exterior air or the exterior soil shall be provided with sufficient thermal insulation to prevent moisture condensation on their room side during the winter and to ensure comfortable conditions for the occupants. (See Note A-9.1.1.1.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Sentence 9.13.2.5.(2) and required by Sentence 9.25.2.1.(3), thermal insulation conforming with Table 9.25.2.1. shall be provided for attached garages and heated detached garages serving a building of residential occupancy.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Except as permitted by Sentence 9.13.2.5.(2) and required by Sentence 9.25.2.1.(3), thermal insulation conforming with Table 9.25.2.1. shall be provided for attached garages and heated detached garages serving a building of residential occupancy.

National Sentence Text: Exterior passenger-loading zones shall comply with Subsection 3.8.3.
P/T Sentence Text: Parking stalls for use by persons with disabilities required by Sentence 3.8.2.5.(2)or 3.8.2.5.(4) shall be designed in accordance with Article 3.8.3.22.
